column1: The Cyclonic storm “MICHAUNG” (PRONOUNCED AS “MIGJAUM”) over Southwest Bay of Bengal was
located near latitude 15.5°N and longitude 80.3°E, at 1130hrs of 05 December and about 650 km north
of Jaffna. The system moves nearly northward away from Sri Lanka towards Andra Pradesh coast of
India. It would cross South Andhra Pradesh coasts during next hour.
